name: METAR/SPECI (US)
description: METAR/SPECI: US (NOAA) variant with altimeter in inches (A) and visibility in statute miles (SM)

auto.description: Fully automated observation without human intervention (15.4)

wind.description: Surface wind dddff[Gfmfm]{KT|MPS|KMH} with P prefix for speeds >99kt/>49mps (15.5)

windNotAvailable.description: Wind not available from automatic system (AUTO)

windVariation.description: Variable wind direction dndndnVdxdxdx when variation ≥60° and <180° (15.5.3)

cavok.description: Ceiling And Visibility OK - vis ≥10km, no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU, no sig wx (15.10)

visibilityNotAvailable.description: Visibility not available from automatic system (AUTO) (15.6.7)

visibilitySM.description: Visibility in statute miles (regional - North America)

visibilitySMNotAvailable.description: Visibility in statute miles not available (AUTO - North America)

rvr.description: Runway Visual Range RDRDR/VRVRVRVRi with P/M prefix and U/D/N tendency (15.7)

weather.description: Present weather w'w' - intensity/proximity + descriptor + phenomena (15.8, Code table 4678)

noWeather.description: Present weather not observable by automatic system (15.8.19)

cloudBase.description: Cloud layer NsNsNshshshs - amount + height without type (15.9.1)

cloud.description: Cloud layer NsNsNshshshs - amount + height in 100s ft + type (15.9.1)

verticalVisibility.description: Vertical visibility VVhshshs in 100s ft when sky obscured (15.9.2)

nsc.description: No Significant Cloud - no cloud <1500m/MSA, no CB/TCU (15.9.1.1)

ncd.description: No Cloud Detected by automatic observing system (15.9.1.1)

temperature.description: Temperature/Dewpoint T'T'/T'd T'd in °C, M for minus (15.11)

temperatureDewpointMissing.description: Temperature with missing dewpoint (dewpoint not available)

temperatureNotAvailable.description: Temperature/Dewpoint not available from automatic system (AUTO)

pressureInches.description: Altimeter setting in inches of mercury (inHg)

recentWeather.description: Recent weather REw'w' since last report or last hour (15.13.2)

rwy.description: RWY keyword for WS ALL RWY

seaState.description: Sea-surface temperature and state WTsTs/SS' or W////SS' when temp not available (15.13.5)

waveHeight.description: Sea-surface temperature and significant wave height WTsTs/HHsHsHs or W////HHsHsHs (15.13.5)

nosig.description: No significant change expected in next 2 hours (15.14)

becmg.description: Becoming - change expected at regular/irregular rate (15.14.4)

nsw.description: No Significant Weather - end of weather phenomena in trend (15.14.12)

editable.description: Day (2 digits) + Hour (2 digits) + Minutes (2 digits)

examples: METAR KJFK 281056Z 32008KT 10SM SCT250 M02/M14 A3042 RMK AO2
METAR KLAX 281053Z 25010KT 6SM HZ SCT015 BKN025 18/12 A2998 RMK AO2
METAR KORD 281051Z 36012G18KT 1/2SM +SN FG VV008 M05/M07 A2985 RMK AO2
SPECI KATL 281045Z 18015G25KT 3SM TSRA BR BKN020CB OVC050 22/20 A2978
METAR KSFO 281056Z 29012KT 10SM FEW020 SCT200 15/08 A3012 NOSIG
METAR KDEN 281053Z 18008KT 10SM CLR 22/M04 A3025 RMK AO2
METAR KMIA 281050Z 09015G22KT 8SM -RA SCT025 BKN045 OVC080 26/23 A2992
